thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text:
I love searching for the unusual. That means getting comfortable and just browsing Ruby Lane. There are tremendous buys for so many unique and interesting items. I will normally spend at least an hour just looking up different merchandise. If I see one item in one shop, I'll always look at the other things in that shop. I have come across some of the best buys. I will say the check out experience has confused me at times. It appears, it may have been updated. My last purchase seemed much easier to complete. So, they have either changed their system or I'm buying more often and I'm more familiar with the way it works!
The sellers are awesome. Asking a question or making an offer, I always receive very quick responses. You couldn't ask for more from an online business. Debbie Bonde
